thread.title: Please save all of the abused dogs, horses, cats and other pets in Maricopa County!
thread.title_full: Please save all of the abused dogs, horses, cats and other pets in Maricopa County!

title: Please save all of the abused dogs, horses, cats and other pets in Maricopa County!
text:
by: MsTien Grueser target: Sheriff Joe Arpaio, animal rights 
The No Kill Animal Shelter of Maricopa County, AZ may be shutting down and/or lack funding. Please help us save this special No Kill Animal Shelter that originally started by (fmr) Sheriff Joe Arpaio read petition letter â–¾ 
Please help save the No Kill Animal Shelter of Maricopa County. They really do their job in rescueing dogs, cats, horses and other pets. Taken from www.dailymail.co.uk. " EXCLUSIVE: Mexico's 'Cinderella carriage' horses forced to drink sewage water and whipped by owners who say 'they only understand violence'"
